body_html: @apaszke Unrolling meaning sending a single step of input to the RNN at a time. i.e. manually unrolling the first dim of input (non-batch-first). This is important if you need to know something about the result of the previous step before you know what to send as input to the next step.
body_text: @apaszke Unrolling meaning sending a single step of input to the RNN at a time. i.e. manually unrolling the first dim of input (non-batch-first). This is important if you need to know something about the result of the previous step before you know what to send as input to the next step.
body: @apaszke Unrolling meaning sending a single step of input to the RNN at a time. i.e. manually unrolling the first dim of input (non-batch-first). This is important if you need to know something about the result of the previous step before you know what to send as input to the next step.
